entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tatamagouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Debert 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: 3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: E 30 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with rain beginning early this evening and ending before morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to periods of snow in the evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
